text: Kohat District is a district in the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province of Pakistan. The city of Kohat is the capital. The Kohati dialect of the Panjabi language is spoken in this district, although outside the province it is influenced by inhabitants of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa. ==Tehsils== * Kohat Tehsil * Lachi Tehsil Category:Districts of British India Category:Districts of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
title: Kohat District
